name: Define Objective
description: Clearly articulate the high-level goal and desired outcome of the project or endeavor.
purpose: Establishes a shared understanding of what needs to be achieved, guiding all subsequent efforts.
applicability_notes: Essential at the beginning of any project, regardless of domain.
typical_inputs: A general idea or problem statement

name: Identify Requirements
description: Determine the specific functionalities, features, and constraints necessary to meet the defined objective.
purpose: Ensures that the solution addresses all necessary aspects and user needs.
applicability_notes: Crucial for projects where specific functionality is expected.
examples_of_usage: Defining features for a mobile app
Listing necessary data points for analysis
typical_outputs: A list of functional and non-functional requirements

name: Design Solution Architecture
description: Outline the overall structure, components, and interactions of the system or solution.
purpose: Provides a blueprint for development, ensuring scalability, maintainability, and feasibility.
applicability_notes: Applicable to any complex system or product development.

name: Develop Core Functionality
description: Implement the essential features and logic that form the primary purpose of the application or system.
purpose: Builds the foundational capabilities of the solution, enabling basic operation.
applicability_notes: The primary phase of creating a functional product or system.
examples_of_usage: Building the main engine of a machine

name: Implement User Interface
description: Create the visual elements and interactive components that users will interact with.
purpose: Ensures the system is usable and provides a positive user experience.
applicability_notes: Relevant for any application or system with a human user.

name: Establish Data Management
description: Set up mechanisms for storing, retrieving, and managing application data.
purpose: Ensures data persistence, integrity, and efficient access, which is critical for most applications.
applicability_notes: Essential for applications that need to retain information.

name: Conduct Testing
description: Verify the functionality, performance, and reliability of the system through various testing methods.
purpose: Identifies defects and ensures the system meets quality standards and requirements before deployment.
applicability_notes: A critical step in any development process to ensure a robust product.

name: Deploy Solution
description: Make the developed application or system available for its intended users or environment.
purpose: Releases the completed work to the target audience, realizing the project's objective.
applicability_notes: The final step in delivering a functional product.
examples_of_usage: Publishing an app to an app store
Deploying a web service to a server
typical_outputs: A live, accessible application or system

name: Gather Feedback
description: Collect input from users or stakeholders on the deployed solution's performance and usability.
purpose: Provides insights for future improvements and identifies areas for refinement.
applicability_notes: Important for iterative development and continuous improvement.

name: Iterate and Refine
description: Use feedback and new insights to improve the existing solution or develop new features.
purpose: Ensures the solution evolves to meet changing needs and maintains relevance and quality over time.
applicability_notes: Key for agile development and long-term product success.
examples_of_usage: Adding new features based on user requests
